save_success_message.description: after the user has saved a page successfully

save_failed_message.description: after the user has failed to save a page

save_progress_message.description: while the user is saving a page

save_abort_message.message: 仅支持 http(s) 打头的页面。

save_settings_message.message: 你需要先到插件的设置页面添加App密码。

save_invalid_json_message.message: 远程服务器返回了错误的数据。
save_invalid_json_message.description: for when server is returning non-json response, usually means server error

app_description.message: 收藏当前页面至rubu.me，可作为书签或分享列表。
